title: Chris Williamson – 2020 Comments on Jeremy Corbyn’s Suspension from the Labour Party
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chris Williamson, the former MP for Derby North, on 29 October 2020.
content:
Don’t say you weren’t warned!
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

  *[4G]: fourth generation mobile network
  *[5G]: fifth generation mobile network

  *[Defra]: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
  *[2G]: second generation mobile network
  *[3G]: third generation mobile network
  *[6G]: sixth generation mobile network
  *[ITU]: International Telecommunication Union
  *[R&D]: research and development
  *[OpenRAN]: Open Radio Access Networks
  *[ONE]: Open Network Ecosystem

The attack on UKLabour socialists was proxy warfare against Jeremy Corbyn. Sadly, his office facilitated the smears. First Ken, then Jackie, then Marc, and then me (and many others!) were thrown under the bus.

In the end, they got Jeremy, too.
